thread.title: China denies currency war as global steel industry cries foul
thread.title_full: China denies currency war as global steel industry cries foul

author: Ambrose Evans-Pritchard
title: China denies currency war as global steel industry cries foul
text: Osborne shouldn't be squeamish about luring businesses from Scotland China denies currency war as global steel industry cries foul Industries across the world are bracing for a deflationary shock as China devalues, but Beijing adamant there is no secret plan to drive down the yuan China recently has ramped up its efforts to crack down on corruption in the world's second-largest economy Photo: Getty Images
